Standard.Arabic ActivityName: صناعة المنتجات بواسطة الطباعة ثلاثية الأبعاد
Standard.Description: Includes firms specialized in conducting additive manufacturing or 3D printing through creating designs of objects with AutoCAD software, then the printer creates a three-dimensional object using lasers to fuse powdered materials together layer by layer, the powdered materials involve metal, plastic, rubber, silicon, ceramic, such technology involves different products and parts such as, jewelry, industrial parts, vehicles, dental and medical industry

This activity involves the trading of abrasive materials and minerals used in various industrial processes, including manufacturing, construction, and maintenance. The business focuses on sourcing and supplying these materials to different sectors.

This is an office established by international academic institutions to represent and boost ties and to facilitate academic exchange with local counterparts; also, educating local students and academic institutions of partners’ universities and their activities and specializations, such office is not allowed to carry out teaching, admission services or commercial activities.

Includes manufacturing suspended access cradles for cleaning and maintaining multi-storey buildings, the process involves cutting and fixing steel and aluminium bars and sections to fabricate the components, including roof mounted davit jibs, gantries, trolley units and monorails, as well as fixing electrical motors and safety equipment.

Includes the offices specialized in setting and designing accounting systems for companies and firms, designing accounting documents, records and books, setting documentary cycles or other accounting processes. These offices offer services against fixed fees, but may not examine or audit accounts.
Includes providing training on maintaining, auditing and recording financial transactions, including, accounting auditing, bookkeeping, tax accounting.
Includes reselling acids and alkalines for producing other industrial products and compounds.
Developing adaptive learning platforms that personalize educational experiences by adjusting content and pace based on individual student progress.
Includes using slitting machines to cut large rolls of adhesives and papers into narrower rolls.

Includes manufacturing adhesive materials for sticking paper, glass, metal, plastic or wood pieces, to use in printing, lamination, packaging, in construction for fixing ceramic, slabs and maquette, or wall-paper...etc, also producing adhesive tapes in paper, plastic, fabrics or others.

Includes reselling of glass, metal, plastic, wood fixing adhesive, packs, boxes, carton boxes closing tapes, paper, tiles, flooring and cladding adhesives and tapes, and any other material not classified under glue and gum.

Includes providing administrative consultancies and studies to public departments and companies as regarding administrative performance analysis, procedural engineering, laying out flow-charts and related documents circulation, internal policy formulation, organizational restructuring, strategic plans development, innovating work procedures, designing balanced scorecards, such firms are not allowed to conduct field surveys and questionnaire before getting approval from the competent authority.

Includes existing facilities whose work is related to educational institutes that conduct training in all areas of administrative work, as these establishments provide and prepare learning rooms and link them with the latest educational means and other closely related services, as well as provide membership cards and participation in training, which provides facilities for the trainee or an additional benefit to those institutes This branch does not include the training and education of clients

Standard.ActivityName: Advanced Agriculture for vegetables and the melons and the roots and the tubers
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: الزراعة المتطورة للخضروات والبطيخيات والجذور والدرنات
Standard.Description: Includes agricultural firms specialized in advanced growing by using methods of hydroponics, vertical farming and greenhouses or other non- traditional methods to grow leafy vegetables, fruits bearing vegetables, melon species, root-planting, tuberous vegetables., also, mushroom and other vegetable for commercial purpose, such firms are allowed to import materials used in the agricultural operations, such as, seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, pesticides, as well as the specialized agricultural tools.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: خدمات الدعاية والإعلان لإنتاج وتصميم الإعلانات
Standard.Description: Includes firms engaged in designing, creating commercial advertising to display in a printed medium such as a newspaper, magazine, periodicals, and  also placing in radio, television, the Internet and other media

An agency specialized in providing advertising and communication services, including developing marketing strategies, creating advertisements for print, digital, and broadcast media, and managing public relations and communication campaigns for businesses and organizations.

Includes firms introduce the products and services of the clients to the public through creating and placing advertising in different media, including published magazines, newspapers, periodicals, outdoor advertising in   billboards, panels and car and bus carding, radio and television advertising, the Internet and mobile phones.
Includes reselling indoor and outdoor advertising requisites like boards, electric and non-electric signs as well as promotional gifts and similar items.

Includes providing consultations to advertising organizations as regarding the creation of advertising campaigns and placement of such advertising in periodicals in order to encourage and persuade consumer behavior with respect to a commercial offering, also to employ different methodologies of research that works to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of advertising.

Includes artworks, pictures, multiple word messages designed on banners flown by airplane in short trips at altitudes and routes permitted by the authorities in charge of air traffic. Airplanes must meet the safety requirements set by the concerned authorities. No firm can practice this activity prior to obtaining the required approvals from the general aviation Authorities and Civil Aviation Department.
Includes manufacturing agarwood, oriental perfumes and incense.
Includes reselling agarwood, oriental perfumes, various types of incense, as well as bottles, empty boxes, vaporizers...etc.

Includes reselling materials intended for protection against and extermination and control of agricultural pests, including disease carriers affecting animals and plants. Pests are meant to be any plant or creature harmful or destructive, such as insects, spiders, nematodes, bacteria, fungal, moss, plant viruses, harmful weeds, parasitic plants, harmful birds, rodents, also, products plant growth controllers and crop protection.

Standard.ActivityName: Agricultural Enterprises Investment, Institution and Management
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: الاستثمار في المشروعات الزراعية و تأسيسها و ادارتها
Standard.Description: Includes firms and holding companies formed in order to invest their funds or create the necessary investments for the establishment of subsidiary projects, which carry out agricultural activities and other subsidiary activities, such as land reclamation, establishment of agricultural projects, cattle, sheep and chicken farms, as well as the marketing of agricultural crops and investment in fish and sea animal resources. This also includes the management of such subsidiary companies and the organization of their affairs.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Wholesale Of Machinery, Equipment And Supplies
Standard.Description: Includes reselling of agricultural equipment and machinery used in farms, orchards and gardens to cut grass and small trees and roots, pesticides sprayers as well as other attachments to enable for different uses.

Standard.ActivityName: Agricultural Equipment & Machinery Spare Parts Trading
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة قطع غيار الآلات والمكائن الزراعية
Standard.ActivityGroup: Wholesale Of Machinery, Equipment And Supplies
Standard.Description: Includes reselling the spare parts of the agricultural machinery for soil preparation, planting or fertilizing, ploughing, manure spreading, seeding, grass cutting, sorters, milkers, pesticides sprayers, poultry and bee-keeping.

Includes offices of the specialized agencies of the fundamental principles of the management of agricultural projects. From the analysis of the project, planning, programming, and organization, and monitored during implementation.and study the different ways to program the agricultural projects,
Includes firms providing consultancy and research related to agricultural economic feasibility, land reclamation and irrigation, agricultural project development, animal poultry farming.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Wholesale Of Machinery, Equipment And Supplies
Standard.Description: Includes reselling gardening and nurseling tools, including soil movers, trees cutters, planters, palm pollination, irrigation hoses, flower pots, fruit baskets, also, wax cells, beekeepers cloths, apiary accessories, as well as poultry and livestock farms tools.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Wholesale Of Machinery, Equipment And Supplies
Standard.Description: Includes reselling of agricultural tractors and machinery, ploughs, seeding devices, and harvesters, and other attachments to enable for different uses.
Includes manufacturing tractors and related agricultural machinery for different operations such as ploughs, seeders, harvesters, planters, threshers, sorters, manure spreaders and soil preparation.

Standard.ActivityName: AI in Human Resources (HR) Integration Services
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: خدمات الذكاء الاصطناعي في الموارد البشرية
Standard.Description: Integrating AI into HR processes for talent acquisition, employee engagement, performance management, and workforce analytics.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: التصميم بالاعتماد على الذكاء الاصطناعي في الميتافيرس
Standard.Description: Includes firms creating computer-controlled characters within a virtual environment or video game or virtual environment that are powered by artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms.
Includes agents of international airlines who are engaged in air cargo operations. They are authorized to reserve spaces for imported, exported or re-exported goods.

Includes firms specialized air transport of exported goods, such firms are allowed to receive goods from different parties as well as handling all related services such as warehousing, crating, unloading and sorting out, they coordinate with freight forwarders and air-cargo agents to reserve aircraft spaces and also arranging insurance formalities.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: النقل الجوي بعقود خاصة للركاب والبضائع
Standard.Description: Includes firms involved in chartering airplanes under charter contracts for air flights in non-scheduled passengers and freight transport flights.

Standard.ActivityName: Air Transport of Radioactive, Chemical & Biological Materials
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: النقل الجوي للمواد الإشعاعية و الكيماوية والبيولوجية
Standard.Description: Includes shipping firms engaged in the air transport of the hazardous chemicals, radioactive and biological materials which require sophisticated handling for safety as well as the compliance of shippers to local and international codes for handling such materials.
Includes reselling central and window air-conditions equipment as well as the split units, whether or not linked with general central air-conditioning system.

Includes assembling unitary and packaged terminal units usually placed in a window or wall opening with the evaporative unit on the interior and the condensing unit on the exterior, and they allow the cooling by drawing the heat from the room and discharged to the environment.

Standard.ActivityName: Air-conditioning, Cooling, Heating and Ventilation Engineering Consultancy
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: استشارات هندسة التكييف والتبريد والتدفئة والتهوية
Standard.Description: Includes advisory offices specialized engineering and preparing designs, drawings and specifications of engineering consultancy and implementation in the field of air conditioning and cooling, heating, ventilation, and may not be the architect or the Office of the engineering consultancy work in non-specialization or licensed by classification

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة قطع غيار اجهزة التكييف والتبريد ومكوناتها
Standard.ActivityGroup: Wholesale Of Machinery, Equipment And Supplies
Standard.Description: Includes reselling spare parts of air-conditioning systems, central, window or split units as well as coolers, cold storage compartments, central water cooling and other refrigeration equipment.
Includes firms specialized in leasing airplanes under lease contracts for air flights in scheduled passenger and freight transport flights including its operational and ground handling tools.

Includes firms specialized in chartering all kinds of civil aircrafts for passenger transport or cargo, whether owned by the company or being re-chartered. It includes renting related tools, spare parts, components as well as other maintenance equipment either in air or ground like escalators, belts, engines, hydraulic lifts, turbo operating units, batteries.

Includes organizations that survey aircrafts in order to categorize according to the applicable local and international standard specifications, classification certificates can be issued as regarding adherence to the technical standards of operation.
Includes reselling of spare parts and other components for aircraft reparation, maintenance, renovation and efficiency upgrading, as well as provision of safety and security systems or others.

Includes trading the wide-body commercial aircrafts designed for scheduled and charter airline flights to carrying passengers and cargo, and also the helicopters for transportation of people, search and rescue, tourism, medical transport and aerial observation.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacture Of Air And Spacecraft And Related Machinery
Standard.Description: This activity involves the construction and assembly of airplanes, focusing on different types of aircraft for various purposes, including commercial, military, and recreational use.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: خطوط طيران للنقل الجوي للركاب والبضائع
Standard.Description: Includes airlines involved in passengers and cargo air transport by civil airplanes owned or chartered by such firms and used for internal and international regular flights.

Includes firms specialized in managing and operating airplane for other parties. This involves executing operations necessary for handling passengers and cargo transport, changing crew and navigators.

Includes reselling the support equipment found at airport terminal, such as baggage handling system, x-ray inspectors, metal detectors, luggage and body scanners, also, equipment at the ramp area, such as bag carts, trolleys for containers and pallets, ground power units, container loader, passenger boarding stairs

Includes servicing an aircraft while it is on the ground and parked at a terminal gate of an airport, involving handling the many service between arrival and departure such as cabin service, catering, ramp service, passenger service, field operation service.
Includes manufacturing photograph albums, whether made of plastic, cardboard or other materials.

Standard.ActivityName: All Types of Motor Vehicles Outfitting
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجهيز جميع أنواع المركبات ذات المحرّكات
Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Cars, Spare Parts, Vehicles And Bicycles
Standard.Description: The activity is concerned with the processes of preparation and modifications of the external or internal shape of the passenger cars to become according to the customer's desire and requirements and also to upgrade the performance of the car in aspects related to reducing fuel consumption and increasing the capacity of the engine and transmission box, modification of the external shape includes modification and addition of parts that change the air dynamics that are exposed to the vehicle such as side margins, front and rear bumpers, rear wings, the interior includes audio systems and air conditioners, as well as preparing and modifying commercial vehicles for other purposes such as selling food, ambulance, concrete-mixers, ...etc

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: استشارات هندسية في الطاقة البديلة والبحوث
Standard.Description: Includes firms that engaged in alternative power and researches consultancy. This activity aims to monitor the trends, methods, tools and emerging findings that can be used to enhance the research process. This research will contribute to the greater benefit of society.
Includes manufacturing the heat conductor and resistant aluminum foils for meat and poultry roasting and for food packaging.

Includes specialized enterprises in the implementation of the work of the aluminum fittings of installations and Buildings This includes contracting for the completion of the work of the structures of the buildings buildings both foreign interfaces or internal structures.

Includes extracting pure aluminum from its primary ores, such as bauxite or alumina, smelting and fabricating in blocks, cylinders or ingots in a way enabling reprocessing by means of traction or rolling to produce aluminum products.
Includes cold and hot extrusion to pure aluminum blocks or cylinders to produce aluminum sections, rods, tubes, pipes, wire cables and others usable in making metallic construction products.
Includes extracting aluminium powder from its basic ores by grinding to use in industrial production or metal coating.

Includes cold and hot rolling operationsto pure aluminum blocks or cylinders to produce aluminum panels and plates, breaking aluminum panels in zigzag order to use them for various industrial purposes or in constructions.
Includes manufacturing amusement centers’ equipment such as billiard tables, electronics and manual games devices etc.
Includes producing domestic animals and birds canned or dried feed, such as grains, seeds, meats, fruits. It also includes health feed like vitamins and tonics, other than veterinary medicines.
Includes reselling cow, cattle and sheep, or chicken, ducks, pigeons breeding farms machinery and equipment, as well as other birds and animals bred for trading and processing their products.

Includes veterinary clinics involved in animal behavior consultancy for pet and farm animals, to solve behavior problems, such as, aggression, anxiety, fears and phobias. Treating these problems will help animal owners to have better relations with them and improve the productivity in the case of farm animals, as well as reducing the risks of injury, it also involves animal etiquette which offers an approach to the positive reinforcement methods of training in all the activities that is provided for the animal.
Includes reselling animals and birds food which can be canned or dried such as grains, seeds, meats, fruits. It also includes health food like vitamins and tonics other than veterinary medicines.
Includes reselling supplements added to at processing fodder, whether of vegetal or animal origin, such as vitamins, amino acids and sulfates.
Includes extracting oil and fat out of animal dairy as well as out of animals and fish and their fats and bones (artificial ghee).
Includes manufacturingthe electric devices which convert electric power into radio waves to use in radio and television broadcasting, telecommunication receivers, wireless computer network, radar.
Includes resellingthe electric devices which convert electric power into radio waves to use in radio and television broadcasting, telecommunication receivers, wireless computer network, radar.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة الاحواض ومعدات عرض الاسماك والحيوانات البحرية
Standard.Description: Includes reselling aquariums to display fish and marine animals in public places, in restaurants serve sea food, in shops sell living fishs and marine animals, also, equipment for preserving chilled for selling.

Includes providing training on the art of beautiful, stylized, or elegant Arabic handwriting or lettering with pen or brush and ink. It involves the correct formation of characters, the ordering of the various parts, and the harmony of proportions.
Includes manufacturing the wear over men gowns from knitted and crocheted fabrics.
Includes reselling of Arab ready made wear, such as dishdashas, ghotra, bishts, oqal and caps, also, women traditional cloak (aba) head covers, veils.

Includes providing services and consultancies related to conservation and preservation of archeological materials by using the method of examination, documentation, treatment, protection to keep that property in as close to its original condition as possible.
Includes preparing small physical models of buildings or engineering projects or advertising and decorative items, used to visualize how the finished work will look like after constructing or making.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: التدريب على الهندسة المعمارية وتخطيط المدن
Standard.Description: Includes providing training on the art, science and techniques of building design that encompasses the soundness of the structure and the functional and economic efficiency and aesthetic considerations, also, regulated growth and improvement of towns in both functional and aesthetical points of view, architectural urban design and planning, architecture, cartography, land surveying, community development and planning, landscape architecture, structural architecture, interior design engineering is not involved.

Manufacturing, production, assembly or processing of all types of armored glass, also known as bullet-resistant glass or ballistic glass, is a specialized type of glass designed to withstand high-velocity impacts and provide protection against gunfire, explosions, and other ballistic threats. It is commonly used in military vehicles, armored cars, security installations

Includes Galleries which constantly show art works such as drawings, sculptures, photographs, handicraft works, masterworks etc. or allocate these works of art for holding exhibitions for artists from time to time. This also includes promotion activities for these works.
Includes for-profit virtual cinemas which present non-mainstream motion pictures and may be aimed at a niche audience.
Includes reselling artificial flowers and plants made of fibers, glass, ceramic and metal, also, flowers arranging.
An entity which specializes in all aspects of Artificial Intelligence and machine learning research and development.

This activity involves the design and production of artificial limbs (prosthetics) for individuals who have lost limbs. The manufacturing process focuses on creating functional, comfortable, and customizable prosthetics that enhance the quality of life for users.

Includes manufacturing artificial marble by by heating the mixture of marble dust, acrylic or polyester resin with pigments , and then cut in sheets or shapes and sanded on one or both sides to use in different construction applications.

This activity involves the production of artificial plants and flowers for decorative purposes. The process emphasizes crafting high-quality, lifelike replicas that can be used in various settings to enhance aesthetic appeal.

The activity is concerned with the manufacture of plastic artificial stone, which is similar to the use of natural marble. It is made by mixing raw materials such as plastic resins with quartz powder, glass and other solid materials residues and pigments then vacuum vibration and pressing stage, marble generation stage, grinding, surface treatment, then cutting, waxing and packaging of the product.
Includes manufacturing asphalt and paving materials derived from petroleum distillation for using in road paving.

Standard.ActivityName: Asphalt Paving Industry and asphalt products
Standard.Description: The activity is concerned with the manufacture of asphalt, which is derived from petroleum refining processes and is used in the works of paving roads, streets, airports and other uses.

Includes reselling telescopes and magnifying equipment in different sizes and magnitudes to observe astronomical phenomena, in addition to measuring instruments to indicate directions, geographical locations, celestial bodies distances calculations..etc.

Includes firms organize virtual public auctions to sell properties or movables by experienced auctioneers and appraisers,  also, carrying out related procedures, mainly obtaining auction permits, announcements, sorting out sold materials, transfer of ownership and value collection.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Organization Of Conventions And Trade Shows
Standard.Description: Includes firms organize public auctions to sell properties or movables by experienced auctioneers and appraisers, and in specialized galleries or in any place specified by the concerned authority, also, carrying out related procedures, mainly obtaining auction permits, announcements, venue leasing, sorting out sold materials, transfer of ownership and value collection.
Includes manufacturing blank magnetic and optical recording media for audio materials recording, including tapes, cassettes, diskettes, discs.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة الاجهزة السمعية والمرئية واجهزة التسجيل ولوازمها
Standard.Description: Includes reselling audio-visual electronic equipment, involving radio sets, gramophones, loud-speakers television and video sets, cinematography projectors, slides projectors, instant translators respectively, also, cinematography and television photographing systems, as well as other non-commercial. Equipment used for photographing and recording inside studios or for commercial purposes are classified under Class 5150.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة المقتنيات والقطع والأعمال الفنية الأصلية
Standard.Description: Includes firms trade in genuine antiques, artifacts and original artworks,, including paintings, drawings, sculptures, photographs, handicraft works, masterworks, and old antique cameras and accessories. Also includes promotional activities for these works such as advertising, public relations and events through a licensed media provider.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacture Of Motor Vehicles, Motorcycles & Its Spare Parts
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing of accessories and attachments fitted to motor vehicles in order to modify the external outline of the car, such as bumpers, air deflectors, additional tyre covers, baggage support base and other accessories made of metals, fiber glass or reinforced plastic...etc.

Includes the reselling accessories fitted in cars and vehicles such as, additional bumpers to adjust exterior, air deflectors to increase the car's efficiency , baggage loading racks to diversify the car's use , as well as sun and rain protectors and small trailers, also, devices fitted in public service vehicles such as police, ambulances and fire.engines.
Includes manufacturing the wire that connect motor vehicle electrical equipment.

Includes manufacturing equipment and accessories used in the artificial application of water to the land or soil where the natural rainfall was insufficient to support crops, it involves pivots for overhead irrigation, pumps, sprinklers, drippers, control and automation equipment.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة قطع غيار السيارات والمركبات ومكوناتها
Standard.Description: Includes reselling spare parts and to use fully or partially in repairing and maintaining motor vehicles, buses, trucks and trailers and other relevant requisites including oils, detergents, paints .. etc..
Includes sewing tarpaulin using strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material to use as loose covers for cars in order to protect from wind, rain, or sunlight.

Includes the manufacture of all kinds of auto-upholstery pieces such as seats or steering wheel and gear covers...etc. It also includes the manufacture of mats and similar products made of fabric, leather, plastic, or other natural or artificial fibers, which are prepared by means of cutting and tailoring.

Includes reselling automatic and manual car cleaning and washing equipment, involving fully automatic tunnel car wash equipment, high press automatic car wash equipment, rollover car wash equipment, mobile equipment, vacuum cleaners, foamers, dryers.

Includes establishments that allocates space for temporary rental for individuals and businesses to store personal belongings or goods and other periods is limited to the tenant keeps keys assigned space, also it has the right to access Maizhae time and the entity providing monitoring and guarding system to preserve the property of individuals contracted companies.
Providing AI-driven customer support solutions, including virtual assistants, chatbots, and automated ticket resolution for enhanced customer service.

Includes manufacturing and assembling remotely controlled gates and barriers to control entry and exit of cars in residential building and private or public parks, it includes making aluminium and steel gates and barriers, assembling motors, remote control devices and transmission and receivers.
Includes reselling automatic gates opened and closed doors by remote controls, as well as automatic barriers regulating entrance and exit in private and public parkings.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacture Of Motor Vehicles, Motorcycles & Its Spare Parts
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing of assembled motor vehicles for transporting passengers, mainly sedans, sports cars and buses, the process involves the assembling using parts and components fully manufactured outside the factory or partly inside

Includes providing services and consultancies related to vehicle engineering which incorporates the elements of design, mechanical, electrical, safety, fuel economy, noise, vibration, and harshness, performance.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacture Of Motor Vehicles, Motorcycles & Its Spare Parts
Standard.Description: Includes workshop specialized in tuning and modifying the exterior or the interior of the automobiles or vehicles in order to personalize the characteristics of a vehicle to the owner's preference, as well as to provide better fuel economy, produce more power, better handling, the exterior includes changing characteristics of the vehicle via side skirts, front and rear bumpers, spoilers, interior involves the audio systems, air conditioning and soundproofing

Includes firms engaged in variety of brokerage services regarding aviation business such as brokering flights on behalf of individuals and companies market for both passenger and cargo transportation, the sale and acquisition of aircrafts..etc

This consultancy provides specialized services in the aviation sector, offering advice and solutions related to aircraft operations, safety regulations, airport management, and aviation technology to help clients improve their aviation services and meet industry standards.
Includes firms specialized in coordinating between their clients and services providers as related to fuel services, airport ground operation, flight permission and passenger facilitation.

Includes providing ground as well as flying training in order to acquire air transport pilot license as per the curriculum and standards laid down by Civil Aviation authority, the courses involve aircraft general knowledge, principle of flights, general navigation, operational procedures, airplane performance, communication.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Of Paper And Paper Products
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing plastic and rubber baby care products, such as, breastfeeding accessories, nursing accessories, cleaning and sterilizers, skin care accessories, pacifiers and teethers, health care and temperature readers.
Includes reselling of children and new-born cradles, chairs, beds, walkers, prams, baskets, linen and covers, toys, creams, lotions and oil and mothers requisites.
Includes the manufacture of baby food such as liquid or dried powdered milk, beverages and juices, biscuits, fruit paste and others.
Includes reselling baby food, such as liquid or powdered milk, beverages, juices and other dried or liquid foods.
Includes reselling of children’s swaddling clothes, nappies, night wear, party clothes, shirts, trousers and others.
Includes backing traditional bread using traditional bakeries.

Includes manufacturing machinery and equipment to produce flour such as grinding mills, feeders, sifters, bran cleaners, blenders, rice hullers, pea splitters, also, bakery ovens, dough mixers and dividers, molders, slicers, cake depositors.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: صناعة منتجات الخيزران والغاب والخوص وماشابهها
Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Of Wood, Wood Products And Furniture
Standard.Description: Includes the manufacture of various products made of cane, branches, bamboo and fronds, other than furniture or containers made of said.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة منتجات الخيزران والغاب والخوص وماشابهها
Standard.Description: Includes reselling of household mats, rugs, baskets made of bamboo, cane, wicker and other, furniture of the same is not involved.

Includes providing training on planning, directing, organizing and controlling financial resources and activities of the financial of institutions and individuals, including Banking services, finance theory, investment analysis, investments and securities, stock-brokering.
Includes manufacturing steel barbed wire for fencing public and private property.

Standard.ActivityName: Barbed Wires, Chains and Mesh Manufacturing
Standard.Description: This activity involves the manufacturing of barbed wires, chains, and mesh products, which are commonly used in security, fencing, and construction applications. The focus is on producing durable and high-quality products that meet industry standards.

Includes reselling intermediate chemicals such as resins, compounds, salts, sulfates, sulfurs, and others used in manufacturing by blending with other substances to produce paints, ink, cosmetics, detergents, fertilizers, pesticides, final chemical products, manufacturing metals, water purification and sterilization, in food industries such as preservatives, colorants, additives, flavors and fragrances, or in environment protection.

This activity involves the manufacturing of products made from non-ferrous metals, such as aluminum, copper, and lead. These metals are essential for various industries due to their corrosion resistance, lightweight, and conductivity properties.

Standard.ActivityName: Basic Precious Metals Production and Refining
Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacture Of Basic Precious And Other Non-Ferrous Metals
Standard.Description: This activity involves the production and refining of precious metals, such as gold, silver, and platinum. The process includes extracting these metals from ores and refining them to high purity levels for use in jewelry, electronics, and investment.

A sports club focused on basketball activities, including organizing team practices, matches, and tournaments. It may also provide coaching and training programs for individuals interested in learning and improving their basketball skills.

Includes manufacturing solutions used to activate the reaction or to maintain the balance of acid intensity in batteries used in generating electric power in vehicles, engines or storing energy or for other purposes.
Includes reselling power generation and storage batteries for cars, boats,motorcycles and other machinery.
Includes manufacturing bearings, metal ball-bearing, cog-wheels, transmission gears and all similar gearboxes and differential gears fabricating units in vehicle engines and driving equipment.

Includes reselling equipment and supplies used in beauty and hair saloons, rehabilitation and personal care centers, also, health oriented equipment like pure and flavoured oxygen generators, relaxation and message equipment like chairs, beds, steam and sauna rooms, other similar ones unclassified as medical or sport equipment.

Standard.ActivityName: Beauty and Personal Care Requisites Manufacturing
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: صناعة ادوات ولوازم التجميل والعناية الشخصية
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing body care requisites and cleaning such as cotton buds, tooth brushes and picks, dental floss, combs, hair brushes, nail and hair cutters and other requisites apart from pharmaceuticals and cosmetics, also, some beautification and personal care items.

Standard.ActivityName: Beauty and Personal Care Requisites Trading
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة ادوات ولوازم التجميل والعناية الشخصية
Standard.Description: Includes reselling of personal beauty treatment scissors ( hair and nails), shaving articles and brushes( hear, teeth and shaving), combs, small mirrors, rasps, wigs, hair dryers and shaving devices (except cosmetics which are classified in No. 5132-06)
Includes the process of cutting and tailoring sheets to manufacture bed covers, pillow cases, blankets, sheets and curtains. It also includes the manufacture of tablecloths and others.
Includes the preparation and serving of beverages for immediate consumption on the premise.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة الدراجات الهوائية وقطع غيارها ولوازمها
Standard.Description: Includes reselling the two or three wheeled bicycles used for recreation, transportation, racing and as children's toys.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacture Of Motor Vehicles, Motorcycles & Its Spare Parts
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing the two or three wheeled bicycles used for recreation, transportation, racing and for children use.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: خدمات الدعاية والإعلان في اللوحات الإعلانية
Standard.Description: Includes creating and placing advertisements virtually including Metaverse billboards that can be used to advertise products, services, or events in virtual reality (VR) or augmented reality (AR)

A recreational facility equipped with billiards and snooker tables where individuals can play these games. The hall may also host tournaments and provide coaching services for those interested in learning the games.

Includes firms engaged in the billing services on behalf of landlords, master developers, owner associations and other service providers, who pay the charges of the utilities consumed by the occupants and beneficiaries and want to recover the charges from each individual unit, it involves collecting consumption data, calculate charging and billing information, produce bills to customers, process their payments, etc.

This activity involves the trading of products that are biodegradable and compostable, including packaging materials, utensils, and other eco-friendly items. The focus is on promoting sustainable practices and reducing environmental impact.
Includes manufacturing the salted, sweetened and flavored biscuits.

Web/mobile platform, which aggregates the listings of third parties (i.e. not the web/mobile platform owners’ own goods or services). The platform has search functionality but does not have the ability to make in-platform purchases and there is no payment gateway allowing for purchases directly through the platform.

A content rich software application/website which aggregates a variety of information and content (e.g. text, photos, graphics, videos etc.) about a specific subject matter or for a specific purpose to make the content accessible to the public in a clear, easy and organized way. Typically there is a subscription element, which may be with or without a subscription fee. In app purchases may be permitted, but this is incidental to the core purpose of the app/website. The app/website is not supporting a physical business; it is an independent business in itself, solely operating through the app/website.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: بوابة محتوى - منصة حجوزات عبر الإنترنت
Standard.Description: Web/mobile e-commerce platform that allows a customer to search, book and pay for an activity or service provided by a third party. The activity/service is paid for directly through the platform (i.e. payment is taken by the platform itself not the third party service provider) and typically the platform will make a commission from each booking

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: بوابة محتوى - منصة مقارنات عبر الإنترنت
Standard.Description: Web/mobile based price analysis tool that allows a customer to use an online search engine to find and compare products and/or services using selected criteria e.g. price, features, reviews, ratings etc. The platform aggregates listings of products and/or services from different retailers but does not directly sell the products itself. The platform typically does not have the functionality to make in-platform purchases (i.e. there is no payment gateway) but instead links the customer with the third party retailer. Comparison tools for higher risk products e.g. medical products, insurance, car loans, mortgages etc. would generally not be acceptable as providing advice in relation to these products may be regulated (e.g. by Ministry of Health).

This activity involves managing the rights to various types of content, such as digital media, publications, and intellectual property. The content may be created by the distributor itself, or by a third party.

Includes firms which represent one or more insurance company/companies in dealing with the insured parties, policy buyers and insurance brokers. An establishment of that kind works for the account of the insurance company under a special contract. It represents the insurance company on the local level and is authorized to carry out business assigned to it, provided that all its acts and activities are approved by the company. It receives its remunerations from the company and not from the insured parties.

An Insurance Broker acts as an intermediary between individuals or businesses and insurance companies. They help clients find the most suitable insurance policies for their needs by comparing different offers from various insurers. Brokers provide expert advice on the types of coverage available and assist in the application process, ensuring that clients get the best terms and premiums. Unlike insurance agents, brokers represent the buyer, not the insurer, and their primary responsibility is to serve the best interests of the client.
