Includes broadcasting audio content over the internet in real time. IP Streaming for Internet Radio allows listeners to access live radio stations or curated content from anywhere in the world via online platforms, enhancing accessibility and reach.

Includes streaming video content over the internet, allowing users to watch live or on-demand television programs via IP networks. IP Streaming for Internet TV provides flexibility in accessing entertainment, news, and other programming on various devices.
Includes the hot or cold forming of iron and steel by passing through a pair of rolls in order to shaping and deforming.

Includes smelting iron primary ores or iron scrap to produce various types of iron and steel blocks, cylinders or ingots, in such a way that they can reproduce various iron products by means of traction, rolling or remelting and molding.
Includes manufacturing vertical or horizontal turning knobs and screw hinges, door and window locks, and others metallic requisites made of copper, aluminum, steel or others.
Includes reselling of steel and copper ironmongery door and window knobs, fixed locks and keys, door joints, and door closing requisites.

Includes reselling equipment and accessories used in the artificial application of water to the land or soil where the natural rainfall was insufficient to support crops, it involves pivots for overhead irrigation, pumps, sprinklers, drippers, control and automation equipment.

Includes firms specialized in laying the technical foundations of the information technology, which comprises the network, the systems and the data bases. It also involves firms engaged in preparing the consultative studies along with the installations of the network and the systems, manpower training is also included.

Includes firms specialized in planning, implementing, and overseeing security measures and practices to protect an organization's information technology (IT) systems, networks, data, and assets from unauthorized access, threats, and vulnerabilities.
Includes manufacturing jackets and overcoats intended to be worn as fashion or as a winter dress.
Includes processing jam from perishable fruits in order to preserve and long-term storage.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Trading In Motor Vehicles And Motorcysles
Standard.Description: Includes reselling personal watercraft used water recreational activities and sport.

Includes firms specialized in conducting selling jewellery, pearls and precious stones to the general public or to other businesses over the internet without needing any human interaction using any of the applications that rely on the internet, it involves coordinating with payment service providers which offer online electronic payments by a variety of payment methods including credit card, smart cards, digital money E-cash.

This activity involves designing jewelry, including rings, necklaces, earrings, and other decorative pieces. The focus is on creating unique, aesthetically pleasing designs that reflect personal style and craftsmanship.

Includes designing the models of gold and precious metals jewellery prior to mechanical or manual production, involving pre-manufacturing drawings, setting technical specifications, materials and production costs calculation, testing to ensure compliance of materials with safety and quality standards.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة المجوهرات والمصوغات من الذهب والفضة
Standard.Description: Includes reselling adornment jewellery such as brooches, earnings, necklaces, bracelets, rings, which are made of gold, platinum, palladium, titanium, silver and gemstones.
Includes shops that provide fruits juices for immediate consumption.
Includes reselling of all vegetable & fruit juices, whether liquid, dried or condensed.

Standard.ActivityName: Juice, Ice Cream & Dry Mixes Processing
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: مزج وتعبئة الخلطات المجففة للعصائر والمثلجات
Standard.Description: Includes producing dry mixtures composed of natural and synthetic ingredients for processing juices and ice cream, mixing and packaging is made on the specifications of the consumers, beverages producers, dealers, restaurants... etc. This activity does not include the production for final consumption.
Includes constructing Concrete Kerbs using slip form casting machine to use separate the road from the roadside.

Includes reselling in-door children rides and games, as well as those installed in public parks and gardens for children entertainmen, including swings, slides, house and aircraft models, whether made of solid and safe materials or of inflatable objects.

Includes manufacturing household’s kitchen electric appliances such as, blenders, toasters, food warmers, can openers, knives sharpeners, water boilers, juice extractors, kneaders, coffee and grains grinders, meat mincers and food processors.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Of Wood, Wood Products And Furniture
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing the cabinets and fixtures of wood with metal fittings incorporated into them in order to install in kitchens for storage of cooking equipment and kitchen appliances.

Labeling Services Includes firms engaged in relabeling in Arabic and English the goods and products which were imported with labels in other languages, it involves submitting such labels to the concerned authorities prior to re-sticking on these goods and products
Includes recruitment offices specialized in bringing in manpower for companies, establishments and individuals and assuming necessary procedures for having their visas issued

Includes reselling of solutions and chemicals for scientific experiments and research, laboratory analysis, including organic and non- organic acids, alkaline, alcohol, salts, compounds elements, rocks, metals and other solid or liquid chemicals.
Includes reselling laboratory requisites for scientific and medical testing and analysis, including glassware, instruments, apparatuses other than chemical solutions and equipment.

Includes preparing lab reagents, solutions or solid like enzymes, clinical chemistry,strains or pregnency test strips respectively, these materials are used to diagnose diseases through blood inside labs or urine in labs or homes, reagents are prepared according to approved protocols and subject to approval by authorised medical authorities.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: صناعة حبك الشرائط والمزركشات وما يماثلها
Standard.Description: Includes the process of weaving lace from natural and artificial yarns and fibers. It also includes the manufacture of other similar woven products such as crochet, brocades, woven belts, as well as ready made garment requisites such as cards, labels, brands, tapestry and others.
Includes the manufacture of ladies' shirts and trousers, party and evening dresses, maternity clothes, wedding dresses, night and in-house wear, beach and bath wear, scarves and others.
Includes reselling ladies' shirts and trousers, party and evening dresses, maternity clothes, wedding dresses, night and in-house wear, beach and bath wear, scarves and others.
Includes manufacturing women undergarments made of woven, knitted or crocheted fabric to be worn under other clothes, whether over or below the waist.
Includes manufacturing lamp bases of ceramic, metal, glass or plastic, which make an electrical connection in the socket of a light fixtures.

Standard.ActivityName: Land and Real Estate Purchase and Sale
Standard.Description: Includes firms engaged in buying and selling real estate, such as residential and non-residential buildings and land, such firms are not allowed to practice the activity no. 6599-08 " Real Estate Development

Includes the planning and design of outdoor spaces, including gardens, parks, and other landscapes. Landscape design focuses on aesthetics, functionality, and environmental sustainability, ensuring that outdoor areas are visually appealing and meet the needs of users.

Includes firms specialized in drawing up designs, plans and specifications for beautification and organization of parks, lands and gardens and harmonizing beauties of the same with the neighboring buildings and natural scenes.

Includes the translation of spoken language in real-time during meetings, conferences, and events. Language interpretation ensures that participants from different linguistic backgrounds can communicate effectively, facilitating global collaboration and understanding.
Creating language learning applications that offer personalized lessons, pronunciation practice, and cultural insights.
Includes institutions primarily engaged in offering language instruction, including sign language and cultural awareness.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة أجهزة ومعدات عروض الليزر والألعاب النارية
Standard.Description: Includes reselling laser and fireworks show products such as, digital light processors, screens and projectors, high powered lighting units, video devices, loudspeaker systems, these firms are not allowed to deal in fireworks materials.
Includes workshops with lathes designed to machine metals.
Includes reselling laundry machinery and equipment for cleaning and ironing clothes, textiles, linen, curtains, carpets and others, whether by steam or dry cleaning.

Includes providing all the services required to train legal employees such as deputies, advocates and clerks. The aim is to promote their knowledge in legal domain through planning training program (training manual), specialized workshops, sessions by training individuals and units to pass law expertise and enlighten on law versions and international treaties and conventions. Concerned firms are not allowed to grant degrees.

Includes offices and firms which offer consultancies and prepare legal studies of the lawsuits and the legal questions submitted thereto. However, they are not entitled to assume the defense before courts in this regard.

Includes specialized offices engaged in providing written translation to documents and texts with contents of general nature or to texts of specific and professional nature, like commercial contracts, legal, commercial, technical and scientific texts. It also includes instant and simultaneous translations provided by specialized translators in meetings, seminars or conferences.

Includes reselling equipment for marine life saving such as life jackets, lifebuoys and boats, also the devices that ignite light, smoke and flare signals used to indicate the position of the distressed lifebuoys in day or night in order to enable rescuing.

Includes providing advice and coaching (Virtually) to help clients transform from sedentary lifestyle into more healthy and active, in order to achieve specific personal or professional goals in different human endeavors, ranging from their concerns in health, personal, professional, sport, social, family, working closely with them to facilitate healthy and sustainable behavior change, with a focus on improving personal behavior as well as enhancing personal appearance

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: الإستشارات في مجال تطوير أسلوب الحياة
Standard.Description: Includes providing advice and coaching to help clients transform from sedentary lifestyle into more healthy and active, in order to achieve specific personal or professional goals in different human endeavors, ranging from their concerns in health, personal, professional, sport, social, family, working closely with them to facilitate healthy and sustainable behavior change, with a focus on improving personal behavior as well as enhancing personal appearance to make them look more beautiful,

Standard.ActivityName: Lifting and Loading Machines and Equipment Renting
Standard.Description: Includes firms engaged in renting equipment and machinery used roads for building and construction, such as, machinery for excavation, filling, demolition, land leveling, road paving, cement mixing, cranes and elevators for lifting building materials at the work site, this can be through self-driving or semi-autonomous vehicles or any other type that will be developed in the future

Standard.ActivityName: Lifting or Handling Works Trucks Manufacturing
Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Cars, Spare Parts, Vehicles And Bicycles
Standard.Description: This activity involves the manufacturing of trucks designed for lifting and handling heavy loads, used in industries such as warehousing and logistics. The focus is on producing durable, high-capacity trucks that meet industry needs.

Includes manufacturing by means of assembling residential, commercial, industrial and servicing (cargo and garbage handling) lifts. The process may involve manufacturing some components such as bodies and cabins, fixing walls, roofs, floors as well as installing doors, motors and control systems. It also includes design (customized), installation and maintenance.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة المصاعد والسلالم المتحركة وقطع غيارها
Standard.Description: Includes reselling lifts fixed in multistoried facilities to carry people and goods, also, escalators and electric belts in airports, shopping centers, hotels and public utilities.

Standard.ActivityName: Lifts, Escalators and Moving Walkways Manufacturing
Standard.Description: This activity involves the manufacturing of lifts, escalators, and moving walkways for commercial and residential use. The focus is on producing safe, reliable, and efficient transportation systems that meet industry standards.
Includes reselling light aircraft with a maximum gross takeoff weight of 100,000 lbs and are used commercially for passenger and freight transport, sightseeing, photography and personal use.

Includes reselling lighting lamps, ornamental ceiling lamps (except crystal chandeliers) switch keys and sockets. This also includes electric bells, spotlights, garden and house lighting device. Public parks and squares lightings are classified under Class 5150.
Includes reselling lighting devices in public gardens, parks, squares, airports, sports stadium and others.
Includes assembling lighting devices in public gardens, parks, airports, sports stadium and others.
Includes reselling utility lighting poles made of metal, concrete or wood for roads, streets and parks lighting.
This activity involves the manufacturing of lime, used in construction, agriculture, and various industrial applications. The focus is on producing high-quality lime that meets industry standards.

This activity involves the manufacturing of liquid batteries used in various applications, including automotive and industrial sectors. The focus is on producing efficient, durable batteries that meet energy storage needs.
Includes processing pasteurized egg liquid and packaging in bulks for using by consumers like restaurants, hotels and catering companies.

Standard.ActivityName: Liquids Filtering or Purifying Machinery and Apparatus Manufacturing
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: صناعة آلات وأجهزة تنقية وترشيح السوائل أو الغازات
Standard.Description: This activity involves the manufacturing of machinery and apparatus designed for filtering or purifying liquids or gases. The focus is on producing equipment that meets the specific needs of various industries.

Standard.ActivityName: Live Theatrical Shows Management and Promotion
Standard.Description: Includes the organization, management, and promotion of live theatrical performances. It includes coordinating performers, securing venues, managing ticket sales, and marketing, ensuring a successful and engaging theatrical experience for audiences.
Includes proportionally mix and blend inks to produce a colour required by the customer

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: مركز تدريب على الحرف التراثية واليدوية المحلية
Standard.Description: Includes providing training on items made by hand originating among the people (community) of UAE, often with the use of simple tools, and is generally artistic and traditional in nature. They are also objects of utility and objects of decoration.
Includes preparing local sweets in stalls sell directly to the public for immediate consumption

Includes manufacturing the mechanical Includes manufacturing the mechanical or electronic fastening devices as well as the keys, keycards, fingerprints and security tokens which release them. or electronic fastening devices as well as the keys, keycards, fingerprints and security tokens which release them.
Includes reselling the mechanical or electronic fastening device which are released by a physical object, such as key, keycard, fingerprint, security token.

This activity focuses on the management of the movement of goods and services from one location to another. Logistics and transportation services ensure that products are efficiently stored, handled, and transported to meet the demands of businesses and consumers.

Includes providing consultancies and solutions to supply chain problems, as well as, providing methodology for improving performance, this involves analyzing the distribution network and delivering practical solutions, auditing the operation and identify the potentials for improvements.

Includes the creation of logos, which are graphic symbols used to represent companies, brands, or organizations. Logo design combines creativity and branding strategy to create memorable and impactful visual identities.

Includes firms that issue and/or operate loyalty and preloaded card programs which enable cardholders to become a member in a loyalty program, the card works as identifier of the holder when making purchases, the member will be entitled to accumulate points and to redeem them against goods and services at participating partners.  It includes joint promotions by partners within the scheme and using partners' outlets for distributing loyalty program information and applications.  Both the firm and the cardholder will benefit of the service, the first will increase the client base and the latter will get additional benefits.
Includes firms engaged in breaking bulk Lubricants and Grease in smaller lots consumer or commercial packs.
includes reselling the high viscosity oil based lubricating substances used for lessening friction in the working parts of a mechanism in order to protect against wear and Transfer heat.

Armouring, shielding, reinforcing or painting military vehicles and mechanisms, or strengthening civilian or military vehicles and vehicles, or any part of their parts, components, spare parts, or laminated glass or their technologies that are intended to be used for protection reasons or for humanitarian purposes.

Standard.ActivityName: Machinery and Equipment for Handling Hot Metals Manufacturing
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: صناعة آلات ومعدات مناولة المعادن الساخنة
Standard.Description: This activity involves the manufacturing of machinery and equipment designed to handle hot metal in industrial processes. The focus is on producing reliable, high-performance equipment that meets safety standards.

The machining or formation are processes performed on different metals to produce final or intermediate products, except for the machining and formation by laser beams. Examples of these processes are: Perforation, turning, milling, milling, cutting, grinding, bending, adjusting, spreading, grinding, tooth, polishing, welding, etc.

Includes the publication of magazines, which are periodicals covering a wide range of topics such as news, fashion, technology, and entertainment. Magazine publishing includes content creation, editing, and distribution to engage readers.

Includes selling magnetic technology equipment and systems which are involved in the application of agriculture and animal resources, thermal energy, constructions, water treatment, chemical and oil industries…etc.

Includes establishments that perform maintenance and repairs for small and light commercial or military aircraft that do not exceed 1,000 pounds during takeoff, as well as helicopters. The activity also includes aircraft renewal and restoration operations, along with specialized shops or centers focused on repairing and maintaining drones to make them fit for reuse. The activity does not include the sale of spare parts for these aircraft.

This activity involves the manufacturing of malt-based alcoholic beverages, including beer and other fermented drinks. The focus is on producing high-quality, flavorful products that meet industry standards.

Includes providing consultancies and studies to help improving the organizations’ performance, through analyzing the existing organizational problems and the development of plans for improvement., it involves procedural engineering, laying out flow-charts and related documents circulation, internal policy formulation, organizational restructuring, strategic plans development.

Includes firms engaged in managing self owned residential units, also handling contractual arrangement with the firms in charged of maintenance & security. Such firms are not allowed to practice real estate brokerage.

Includes offices opened by an industrial or commercial firms or company in order to organize the administrative and office affairs of the same. Thus, these offices are not allowed to practice any commercial works. They must also be linked to an industrial or commercial establishment, previously licensed.

Includes offices founded by businessmen to care for and reserve their interests in the establishments they own and the companies where they hold shares, such firms are not allowed to practice the activity of Facilities Management Services.

This activity involves the production of optical magnifying instruments, such as microscopes and magnifying glasses. The focus is on producing precise, high-quality instruments used in various scientific and industrial applications.

This activity involves the production of protective safety equipment, including helmets, gloves, and other gear used in various industries to ensure worker safety. The focus is on producing durable, reliable equipment that meets safety standards.
Includes providing engineering support and services to steel and metal plants with regard to thermal dynamics, material engineering, interaction engineering, thermal and matter transmission.
Manufacturing Design is the the general engineering practice and process of designing products.

Includes reselling varieties of marbles and natural stones like granite, basalt, limestone, this activity is limited to firms that trade these materials as crude before any conversional processes except cutting in blocks or slabs for transport purposes.

Includes cutting natural and artificial marble, granite and other stones, in different sizes for using in constructions or for any other industrial purpose, polishing, burnishing and engraving are included as well.

Includes assembling marine guide aids, such as, multi-purpose buoys, signal lantern and remote monitor and control systems, for using in lighthouses, ports and harbors, by costal guard and oil and gas companies.

Standard.ActivityName: Marine Machines and Equipments Repairing and Maintenance
Standard.Description: Technical workshops and workshops specialized in the maintenance and repair of all marine machinery and equipment operating for all types of boats and marine boats. This activity does not include repairing the body of the boat or the boat of any kind, whether this is done through direct demand or maintenance and repair contracts.

Includes firms engaged in providing engineering consultancies and services to marine projects such as floating marinas and infrastructure for waterfronts developments, which would be submitted to the concerned authorities for approval, these firms are not allowed to involve in the designs and drawings of said projects

This activity involves providing engineering consultancy services for marine surveys, including mapping, inspections, and assessments of underwater and coastal structures. The focus is on ensuring accuracy and safety in marine operations.

Includes firms specialized in providing consultancy in the different marine fields, such as, shipbuilding and repairing contracts, ships buying, selling, operating and chartering contracts, Inspection of ships, registration and issuance of certificates, marine debts and guarantees of releasing arrested ships, marine pollution damage and claims

Standard.ActivityName: Marketing for Products and Services via Telephone
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: خدمات التسويق للمنتجات والخدمات عبر الهاتف
Standard.Description: Includes all organizations that operate in the field of marketing products and services using telephone communication (telemarketing) with targeted groups (consumers). These organizations may use telemarketing for their own products or for marketing products of other companies by signing telemarketing contracts with companies. The contractual agreements will cover details of the products or services being marketed and the targeted consumer groups, including setting up processes and guidelines to reach consumers. This activity involves reaching targeted groups through the following marketing methods: using landline or mobile phones, sending marketing text messages, or using marketing messages through social media networks. It also includes organizing the marketing operations of these organizations, setting appropriate times for communication with consumers, and establishing other guidelines to ensure consumer satisfaction.

Includes firms provide assistance to businesses on marketing products and services to attract and retain customers, involving advice on planning, pricing, sale outlets, it involves digital marketing by using digital channels to promote or market products and services to consumers and businesses, such firms are not allowed to sell the products and services they are promoting.

Includes conducting field surveys and questionnaires to explore the opinion of the consumers, producers and distributors of the goods and services on the way the commodity is designed, and come out with results which could assist in the marketing, the pricing and the effective promotional campaign, in order come out with results that assist in marketing and sales boosting, such firms are not allowed to conduct field surveys and questionnaire before getting approval from the competent authority.

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: خدمات التسويق عبر وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي
Standard.Description: Includes firms specialized in helping businesses and others to promote and market their products and services via social media applications, it involves preparation of plans to attract and retain customers, as well as coordinating to purchase an advertising space and to identify the range of targeted customer segment
Includes the manufacture of different types of mats and rugs made of fibers or spinned material. It also includes mats made of jute or carpet cuttings.
Includes making mattresses internally fitted with cotton.
Includes producing mayonnaise using vegetable oil, egg yolk, vinegar or lemon juice, and spices.

Includes reselling of all measurement, observation and control systems and equipment, this applies to land surveying, measurement of quantities, distances, temperature, humidity, height, geographical and environmental changes, also, equipment and devices to control the flow of water, liquids, electricity, gases, regulators of speed and operations of production levels, also, cadastral and meteorology meters, also, devices to automate and control home electrical and electronic appliances.

Standard.ActivityName: Meat & Fish Processing Equipment & Machinery Trading
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة معدات وآلات تهيئة اللحوم والاسماك وتجهيزها
Standard.Description: Includes reselling of equipment and machines for processing slaughtered cattle, chicken, fish and seafood, including skinning, defeathering, removal of crusts, cleaning and removal of unwanted parts, also, cutting meat in slices, filets, or mincing meat and preparing for cooking.
Includes processing food products that of meat origin, such as hot-dogs, conserved minced meat, slices of minced meat (hamburger) and others.
Includes freezing meat and packaging in packs or bags to render them consumable.
Includes firms which offer mechanical engineering services and consultancies with all or most of their specialties such as industrial production engineering and hydraulics mechanics...etc.

This activity involves providing mechanical engineering services, including design, installation, and maintenance of mechanical systems. The focus is on ensuring the safe and efficient operation of machinery and equipment.

Includes providing engineering support and services to electric generating stations, air-conditioning, and auto engineering, with regard to thermal dynamics and transmission, to thermal equipment, power plants, and fuel combustion, and propelling systems technology.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Coating, Insulations, Seals & Protection Materials Manufactu
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing cork, paper, metal and rubber joints, rings fitted in engines and machines connectors or in combustion chambers covers or gear boxes in order to prevent leakage, heat absorption and friction.
Includes manufacturing souvenir articles such as medals, badges, decoratives and necklaces by means of die casting of various metals such as copper and bronze ... etc.

This activity provides expert advice on media and marketing strategies to businesses and organizations. Media & marketing consultancy helps clients enhance their brand visibility, reach target audiences, and optimize marketing campaigns for better outcomes.

Includes purchasing advertising space in various media channels, such as TV, radio, and online platforms. Media buying and placement ensure that advertisements reach the intended audience in the most effective and cost-efficient way.

Includes managing and providing media content, including video, audio, text, and other multimedia formats. Media content providers ensure the efficient storage, distribution, and accessibility of digital media across various platforms.
Includes firms specialized in providing the media content related service providers in blockchain and web3 space or to content that supports blockchain and web3 space make them available for users.

Standard.ActivityName: Media Hardware Equipment and System Integration
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تكامل النظم وتطوير الأدوات الإلكترونية للإعلام
Standard.Description: This activity focuses on the integration of hardware and systems used in media production and broadcasting. It includes the installation and maintenance of cameras, microphones, editing systems, and other technical equipment necessary for producing high-quality media content.

Includes tracking and analyzing media coverage across various platforms, including print, broadcast, and online media. Media monitoring helps businesses and organizations understand their public image and the effectiveness of their media strategies.

This activity refers to acting on behalf of media outlets or media owners in negotiations with advertisers, agencies, or other stakeholders. Media representation ensures that the interests of media owners are well-represented and that ad space is effectively sold and managed.

Standard.ActivityName: Media Software Development and System Integration
Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تكامل النظم وتطوير البرامج الإلكترونية للإعلام
Standard.Description: Includes developing software solutions and integrating systems used in media production, editing, and distribution. It includes creating custom applications for media companies to streamline workflows, enhance content creation, and improve operational efficiency.
Includes institutions primarily engaged in providing support services that support media services in blockchain and web3 space or to supports blockchain and web3 space

Includes designing and managing websites for media companies and content providers. Media web design focuses on user experience, accessibility, and visual appeal to ensure that media content is easily accessible and engaging for online users.

Includes manufacturing of articles and requisites, other than medicines and pharmaceuticals, used in surgical operations such as sutures used for stitching incisions or wounds resulting from surgeries or accidents, also, manufacturing masks, gloves, bandages, plasters, personal protective Uniforms ... etc.

This activity involves the manufacturing of medical and surgical equipment used in hospitals and clinics, such as surgical instruments, diagnostic devices, and patient monitoring systems. The focus is on producing reliable, high-performance equipment that meets healthcare standards.

A health facility licensed where there is more than one doctor licensed permanently in different specialties under central management. It is specialized in examining patients and prescribing therapy on an outpatient basis.

Includes providing public and private healthcare facilities with consultancies on how to build the facilities as well as the specifications of the equipment and instruments and where to locate. To healthcare industries on how to plan manufacturing, the process flow, analyzing equipment efficiency and marketing planning. To universities and medical institutions on instrumentation and to set standards for students learning and curriculum designing. To public authorities involved in medical equipment and to contracting companies constructing healthcare facilities.
Includes reselling of specially bottled gases for medical and treatment purposes, including oxygen, sterilization and anesthesia gases.

Includes offices which offer specialized services to patients seeking medical treatments in UAE, or act as health tourism provider for patients intend to obtain these services abroad, it involves contacting hospitals and healthcare providers, coordinating with health insurance providers, handling visas and travel issues, provision of logistical information, such as accommodation, ground transportation, expected duration of stay and cost of treatments, it also involves handling non-medical barrie

Standard.Arabic ActivityName: تجارة الادوات والمستلزمات الطبية العلاجية والجراحية
Standard.Description: Includes reselling of certain instruments and precise medical apparatuses for treating of certain diseases, such as earphones, batteries for cardiac patients, pulse regulators, walking-sticks, splints for bone fractures, medical shoes, artificial limbs, dentures and other medical instruments, also, surgical requisites like artificial organs and parts to replace damaged organs, bone joints, heart valves, in additional to surgical suture bandages and plasters .

Includes reselling instruments and equipment used in hospitals and clinics for diagnosis, treatment, surgical operations, medicine and blood preservation, X-raying, sterilization, waste disposal, physical therapy and rehabilitation, also, manual kits and instruments used for check-up, surgical operations and bandaging.

Includes manufacturing chemicals that pharmacological properties to use in the manufacture of medicaments whether for diagnostic, preventive, therapeutic and disinfective uses such as alcohols ethanol (ethyl alcohol).
Includes reselling medicinal basic chemicals to manufacture medicines.
This activity involves the manufacturing of pharmaceutical products, including tablets, capsules, and injections. The focus is on producing safe, effective medicines that meet regulatory standards.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Of Paper And Paper Products
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing cotton paper sheets to use in laminating wooden furniture , the process involves dappling and designing the sheets in different colors and then impregnate in melamine , to turn the laminated surfaces water-proof , chemical and scratch resistant.

Facilities specialized in cutting, hairdressing and shaving for men, and the activity includes the process of trimming and shaving the hair and beard, as well as washing the hair with different types of shampoo, drying it with hot air, and straightening the hair from wrinkles with different types of creams, with the preparation of dyes and henna to change the hair color according to the request of the customer
Includes reselling men's garments, such as shirts, suits, coats, jackets, socks, ties and others.

Includes the manufacture of men's cotton, wool, silk apparel, either knitted or woven. This includes all kinds of shirts, night wear (pyjamas), in-house clothes, beach and bath wear, trousers, shorts, ready made men's suits, ties and others. This activity does not include tailoring and sewing shops, as they are classified under class 3800.
Includes manufacturing men undergarments made of woven, knitted or crocheted fabric to be worn under other clothes, whether over the waist like T-shirts or below the waist like pants.
Includes reselling alloys to produce steel plates, structural beams, columns, angles, seamless and welded pipes.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Of Wood, Wood Products And Furniture
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing metal, plastic or wooden venitian blinds which are fixed to be vertically or horizontally pleated.
Includes reselling metal slat blinds which consist of many horizontal slatsand connected to allow light to pass between the slats.
Includes manufacturing buckets, trays and other metal products used for any purpose other than household utensils, this includes pots and vessels for plantations, laboratories and workshops.

Includes Manufacturing of metal cabinets and enclosures made of metal panels and used for protecting electrical and industrial distribution control panels, generators, distribution points and fire extinguishing enclosures, or gas assembling or in ventilation.
Includes reselling metal cans and containers for the distribution or storage of goods.
Includes manufacturing steel, aluminum and cooper doors and windows and accessories, whether traditionally styled or bullet and blast resistant styles, frames from the same materials are included.
Includes manufacturing containers of metal for storage and transportation of water, petroleum products, chemicals and other liquids.
Includes reselling containers of metal for storage and transportation of water, petroleum products, chemicals and other liquids.

Includes firms which offer services and consultancies on industrial engineering with its technical and technological specialties such as the use and maintenance of machines and equipment, factory planning, product design and other consultancies concerning factory operation and production planning.
Includes manufacturing aluminum and galvanized steel false ceilings to work as acoustic and heat isolators as well as decorator.

Includes making steel and aluminium mesh by cutting and melting to use in industrial complexes floors and staircases, in balcony and stairs handrails, also the requisites like supports, bolts, angles and handles.
Includes design, fabrication, and assembly of metal structures used in various applications such as construction

Includes specialized engineering consultancy offices that prepare designs, drawings, and specifications for consulting in the field of metal industries. Engineering consultancy cannot be practiced without being registered in the engineering consultancy offices register.
Includes reselling industrial basic ores for extracting various metals including hematite, bauxite, and zinc ore...etc.
Includes manufacturing metal panels for proofing heat, humidifying and sounds for fixing in cold storage compartments, refrigerated trailers, furnaces, pre-fabricated houses and factories.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Manufacturing Of Wood, Wood Products And Furniture
Standard.Description: Includes manufacturing readymade partitions used to divide space in offices and open halls, usually fully made of aluminum, sheet iron or other metals, this involves all metal partitions even if certain parts made of wood, plastic or carton.

Standard.ActivityGroup: Coating, Insulations, Seals & Protection Materials Manufactu
Standard.Description: Includes final or intermediate metal products coating with paints, powders, polishing and protective materials, or by unprecious metals, This can be carried out by using electric, chemical, or conventional coating methods.

Standard.ActivityName: Metal Products Coating With Precious Metals
Standard.ActivityGroup: Coating, Insulations, Seals & Protection Materials Manufactu

Owning capital in subsidiary companies refers to a parent company holding a controlling interest in one or more subsidiary companies. This means the parent company owns the majority of shares, typically more than 50%, in the subsidiary, giving it control over the subsidiary's management and operations. The parent company makes strategic decisions, guides the subsidiary's activities, and consolidates its financial results into the overall group’s financial reports. The subsidiary, while maintaining its separate legal identity, is effectively under the control of the parent company.

A robot is a mechanical or virtual artificial agent, usually an electro-mechanical machine that is guided by a computer program or electronic circuitry. Robots can be autonomous, semi-autonomous or remotely controlled[citation needed] and range from humanoids such as ASIMO and TOPIO to Nano robots, 'swarm' robots, and industrial robots. By mimicking a lifelike appearance or automating movements, a robot may convey a sense of intelligence or thought of its own. The branch of technology that deals with robots is called robotics. Simulation is the imitation of the operation of a real-world process or system over time. The act of simulating something first requires that a model be developed; this model represents the key characteristics or behaviors of the selected physical or abstract system or process.
